skins.selfIntroduction: I am Hardy, flotilla leader of the Royal Navy's H-class. At the Battle of Narvik, I led an assault on an Iron Blood port. We were able to land a heavy blow, but the enemy reinforcements... If only I had more time back then...
skins.acquisition: It's an honour to meet you, Your Excellency. Hardy, destroyer of the Royal Navy, reporting for duty.
skins.login: You seem to be running a little late. Your Excellent, please begin your work soon.
skins.details: Nothing can be achieved without repeated practice. Your Excellency, you should know this quite well, yes?
skins.secretaryIdle1: There's something relaxing about this office, hmm... W-woah?! I, I'm not nodding off!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I may be a flotilla leader, but that's because I've earned the trust of my sister ships. It's not like I have a higher rank than them.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hunter, I bet you ate my cake again! ...Oh, sorry, Your Excellency, did I disturb you?
skins.secretaryTouch: Eek?! ...Your Excellency? Please don't suddenly touch me like that!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: This rapier may be decorative, but the business end still hurts!
